entries.name: archetype
entries.intent: Complete archetype lifecycle - analyze projects, create templates, scaffold new projects, register architecture, generate Harness templates, and export diagrams

entries.name: generate
entries.intent: Generate code, models, and tests from schemas and specifications - API clients, data models, test suites, database migrations

entries.name: harness
entries.intent: Harness CI/CD operations - create and validate pipelines, manage templates (step/stage/pipeline), list templates, and trigger deployments

entries.name: scaffold
entries.intent: Scaffold complete projects with automatic Harness integration, environment configuration, and post-generation setup

entries.name: template
entries.intent: Manage and interact with templates - list, search, view details, generate from templates, and validate template configurations
